Faults.message:
We're aware of a fault causing customers in the area to be without power. We expect the cause of this to be from the strong winds and heavy rain Storm Bert is bringing across our network. We've been tracking this weather for several days and have additional teams on hand to respond. It's possible that either the wind or rain has caused damage to our network and our teams will need to repair this as and when it's safe to do so.

Our local engineers have been informed this area is without power and are working hard to get the lights back on. We will continue to issue updates to the restoration time here and suggest you register for updates on this page so we can notify you if anything changes.

Thank you for your patience and if you need any help or additional information in the meantime, please call us by dialling 105 or send us a message on Facebook
